Package se.itu.game.cave

Provides the classes necessary to implement the version 1 of the Cave game.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Player
    Represents a Player in the game
    Room
    Represents a room in the cave.
    Thing
    Represents a Thing in the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Room.Direction  

Package se.itu.game.cave Description

Provides the classes necessary to implement the version 1 of the Cave game.

In this version, we have:

  • Thing - A class representing a Thing in a Room or in the Player's inventory
  • Room - A class representing a Room with a List of Things (if any) and a maximum of four exits to other Room's
  • Player - The player of the Game

The Player can pick up or drop a Thing in its current Room, give us its inventory (List of Thing references) and go in a Direction.

A Room has a maximum of four exits to other Rooms in the directions North, South, East, and, West, and it can have zero or more Things which can be taken by the Player or added to the Room by the Player.

There are no rules implemented for taking Things in this version.
